name: Sweet Nightmare (Adafheyesh, Almost)
description:
Controls

WASD and Mouse.

(See bottom-left of screen for current controls)

Gameplay

The rules change every 10 seconds, so be ready for anything!

Collect fruit to earn points.

Share your scores on the leaderboard!

Tips

The shrinking background circle indicates how long until the next rule change.

Perform combos to get bonus points.  (3 kills, 5 fruit in midair, and 6 bounces while golfing)
